main event: Two objects were sighted traveling side by side over Route 146 towards Worcester airport, rotating continuously, and appearing bright reddish-orange in color.
interesting points: The sighting lasted between 10 to 15 minutes,The objects were observed by a civil pilot at night,Airport reports indicated no traffic in the vicinity at the time of the sighting,Objects did not seem to be blocked by any security measures as no holes in fences were reported,Pilot used a helios-3 wind instrument during the observation.
